name: Rewrite Time~ Chapter 1
description:
A boy named Owen meets two runaway girls that claim to be aliens. Who's searching for them? Where did they come from? And why did they land on Earth of all places? Through each branching narrative path, you'll slowly piece together the larger story. After all, life is like a ripple in a pond. Your choices can affect time in mysterious ways.

Install Instructions~

This game was created using the app Kocho. To play this game, please install the Kocho app on a mobile device. (Compatible with both Apple and Android.)

(My game is also available on the Kocho app homepage)

Step 1: Download the  Kocho app on your device. (Apple store or play store) 

Step 2:  Download the the game file provided.

Step 3:  Open the Kocho app. Go over to Libary and press the Add Novel button to upload the game. (Open your device files and you should see rewrite time--chapter-1. kocho)

Then boom, you're done. 👍
